title: GPU not used.
body:
# Problem
GPU not used.

![1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/58417213/84295310-5eefdf00-ab85-11ea-9c38-656022d0c6bb.PNG)

When I checked cudnn with waifu2x-caffe, it was displayed as follows. So cudnn is available.However, neither GPU nor CUDNN is used.
![キャプチャ](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/58417213/84295172-37007b80-ab85-11ea-990d-69f4b3900ec5.PNG)

# My settings
![2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/58417213/84295427-8ba3f680-ab85-11ea-98fb-05c932cc58fd.PNG)
![3](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/58417213/84295443-8e9ee700-ab85-11ea-9381-3a2f9bf25056.PNG)
